EmailTemplate.subject: URGENT - Deadline to respond to Assessment Invitation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Invitation to Assessment
Dear {!Step_Forward_Activity__c.Associate__c},
Thank you for applying to Step Forward. We are pleased to tell you that you have been successful in your application and we would like to invite you to the first stage of our assessment event. We were very impressed with your application so congratulations on reaching this stage!
The assessment event is an opportunity for us to get to know each other better and find out if Step Forward is the right programme for you. The details of your assessment are as follows:
{!Step_Forward_Activity__c.Assessment_group_assignment__c}
Address: The Challenge, Elizabeth House, 39 York Road, London, SE1 7NQ
Please confirm your attendance here by Monday 8 December. If you do not confirm your attendance by the deadline we cannot guarantee that we can save you a space.
We will send another email by Friday 12 December with more detailed information about the assessment and tips on how to be successful.
If you have any queries in the meantime please contact step.forward@the-challenge.org with ‘Step Forward Assessment’ in the subject title.
Well done once again for reaching this stage, we look forward to meeting you.
----------------------------------------------------
Important information about the assessment:
Stage 1: Saturday 13 December or Sunday 14 December
- Teamwork activities
- Pathway activities
If you are successful at Stage 1, we will invite you to Stage 2 by email by Monday 15 December.
Stage 2: Evenings of Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday or Friday, 16 – 19 December
- Individual interviews
Best wishes,
The Step Forward Team
WWW.STEPFORWARD.UK.COM
